title: Russian Collection SET of 6 x 8.5 oz. Traditional Cut Crystal Drinking Glasses, fits metal Glass Holder "Podstakannik", Tempered for Hot and Cold Liquids, Vintage Design
features: 250 ml / 8.5 oz glass is slightly tapered from top to bottom measuring 2 3/4" top diam. x 2.5" bottom diam. x 4 1/4"H
Set of 6 glasses Suitable for Hot and Cold liquids
Fits the Russian metal glass holder "podstakannik"
The thin yet durable crystal makes sipping tea a pleasure
description: 6 beautiful 250ml 8.5 oz traditional Russian cut crystal drinking glass suitable for hot drinks as well as cold drinks. It fits the Russian tea glass holder PODSTAKANNIK also sold in our store. The design on the glass is identical to the rest of the crystal collection offered in our store so you can keep adding to your set and it will always match. The glass is slightly tapered from top to bottom measuring 2 3/4" top diam. x 2.5" bottom diam. x 4 1/4" high. Makes a beautiful statement at your dinner table and in your glass showcase. Hand made beautiful cut crystal glasses from the republic of Belarus. An old Russian tradition of tea drinking during a long train ride required being able to hold a glass filled with hot tea. These glasses fit a metal glass holder "podstakannik" or they can be used by themselves. A beautiful design on the glass is sure to decorate your dinner table.
